desc.data: ¶• Americanist and Indo-Europeanist usage for phonetic beta¶• Americanist orthographies use an alternate glyph with the stroke through the bowl¶• Old Saxon¶• uppercase is 0243¶→ (greek small letter beta - 03B2)¶→ (blank symbol - 2422)
